title: (x) slab serif face at WeFeelFine - Placebo Serif {Fabio Augusto, Stephen}
content:
I got my head twisted today. Very nice typeface, but can someone please me identify it.

Thanks.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [wefeelfine.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20101101030759/http:/typophile.com/files/wefeelfine.png) | 16.71 KB |
author: Johan Holmberg

comments.content:
I thought it was Caecillia, but there's a few differences.

- Lex

Very close to Placebo Serif, designed by Thierry Puyfoulhoux.

[http://www.presencetypo.net/Pages-html/AlInSeRe.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20101101030759/http:/www.presencetypo.net/Pages-html/AlInSeRe.html "http://www.presencetypo.net/Pages-html/AlInSeRe.html")

I believe this is the uncommon [Placebo Serif](http://web.archive.org/web/20101101030759/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=PRE.119265.0.4&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=good+in+a+sense&sampleSize=40) by the underrated [Thierry Puyfoulhoux](http://web.archive.org/web/20101101030759/http:/www.fontshop.com/showfont.cfm?did=704).
